mean_cn: n.英语，英国人；  adj.英国的，英国人的，英语的
mean_en: the language, originally of England, now spoken in many other countries and used as a language of international communication throughout the world
sentence: English is spoken widely all over the world.
sentence_trans: 英语在全世界广泛使用。
word_etyma: Engl英国 + ish某国的，某国的语言 → English英国的，英语
